title: How do rich people find the best properties to buy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rich or poor, it makes no difference. People acquire the best properties by doing their research or by hiring experts to do the research for them. They network or their hired experts network. They study, and most of all they work hard to gather information so they can make informed decisions.

I just got an opportunity to connect to a site where rich people (accredited investors) will pay for someone to research properties that have certain features and they will then pay a “finder’s fee” anywhere between $3K and $15K per deal. I will be joining the network tomorrow. (01/26/2017)
